Interface DocWriter


  • public interface DocWriter
    Interface the DocIndexer gets to store documents.

      • indexWriter

        BlackLabIndexWriter indexWriter()
        Get the general index writer object. Not sure if this method is needed; we probably want to see if we can leave it out.
        Returns:
        writer

      • addToForwardIndex

        int addToForwardIndex(AnnotationWriter prop)
        Add a list of tokens to a forward index
        Parameters:
        field - what forward index to add this to
        prop - the a to get values and position increments from
        Returns:
        the id assigned to the content

      • continueIndexing

        boolean continueIndexing()
        Should we continue indexing or stop? We stop if we've reached the maximum that was set (if any), or if a fatal error has occurred (indicated by terminateIndexing).
        Returns:
        true if we should continue, false if not

      • docsToDoLeft

        int docsToDoLeft()
        How many more documents should we process?
        Returns:
        the number of documents

      • listener

        IndexListener listener()
        Get our index listener, or create a console reporting listener if none was set yet. Also reports the creation of the Indexer and start of indexing, if it hadn't been reported already.
        Returns:
        the listener

      • indexerParameters

        Map<String,String> indexerParameters()
        Get the parameters we would like to be passed to the DocIndexer class. Used by DocIndexer classes to get their parameters.
        Returns:
        the parameters
